event_name: Wed Women's Bible Study: Spring Fellowship at Bornstedt Park

event.description: Please join us at the Bornstedt Park in Sandy. if the weather is nice, we'll be able to use the splash pad. Please being your maindish/sandwiches, drinks and a side or treat to share. Bring your lesson 8 and choose 1-2 questions you'd like to discuss.
event.name: Wed Women's Bible Study: Spring Fellowship at Bornstedt Park
event.summary:
Please join us at the Bornstedt Park in Sandy. if the weather is nice, we'll be able to use the splash pad. 

Please being your maindish/sandwiches, drinks  and a side or treat to share.  

Bring your lesson 8 and choose 1-2 questions you'd like to discuss.
